channel.title: Mario on Lindskold
channel.description: Recent content in Mario on Lindskold

item.title: MAR10
item.description: March 10, a.k.a. MAR10 day. First celebrated by Nintendo 2016, probably when some clever Nintendian came up with the idea. And since then, they’ve actually made something each year to celebrate Mario, even if some years have been lazier than others. This year we got the final trailer for The Super Mario Bros. Movie, Wave 4 of the Mario Kart 8 Deluxe – Booster Course Pass (car stuff, pretty fitting since it’s also the V8 engines day today) and a new Mario themed Nintendo Switch bundle. And lots of smaller stuff as well. Like whatever this is. I must admit though, I am pretty hyped for the movie, so another trailer is always welcome!
